comments:
hi, 

 I'm seeing a NPE in BuildSystemVariableSupplier.getMacros. Debugging traces back to

org.eclipse.cdt.core.settings.model.extension.impl.CDefaultConfigurationData.getBuildVariablesContributor()

which currently always returns null.

I've worked around this in my local workspace by instead returning a Null implementation of the expected interface. I'll attach this in case its saves you 30s, but I'm not sure its the correct thing to do ;)

Created an attachment (id=59960)
simple but maybe incorrect fix
